title: Technology-Integrated Language Education Design: Strengthening Managerial Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Optimized asynchronous content delivery and collaboration tools for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Technology-integrated language education design based on learner needs can be implemented through a three-stage process (analysis-development-evaluation).
By applying the TPACK framework, two or more educational activities combining language content and mobile technology can be developed.
A project-based assessment utilizing LMS and smartphone apps can be designed, and an improvement plan incorporating peer feedback can be submitted.

resources: Digital Content Development Guide for Language Education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
